entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or rain near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
